Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Clear argons from {@Rgn:47002$$Whitefrost Forest} in {@Rgn:47001$$Tirkai Forest}.

Kill {@LinkCreature:47#1001#Tirkai grizzlies}, {@LinkCreature:47#1002#argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies}, and {@LinkCreature:47#1003#argonomorph mugatos}.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
